001
002package com.commercetools.compat;
003
004import java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException;
005import java.net.URI;
006import java.net.URLEncoder;
007import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
008import java.nio.file.Files;
009import java.time.Duration;
010import java.util.AbstractMap;
011import java.util.List;
012import java.util.Map;
013import java.util.Optional;
014import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
015import java.util.stream.Collectors;
016
017import io.sphere.sdk.client.SphereRequest;
018import io.sphere.sdk.http.*;
019import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.*;
020import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.utils.FileUtils;
021
022import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.EqualsBuilder;
023import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.HashCodeBuilder;
024
025public class CompatRequest<TResult> extends ApiMethod<CompatRequest<TResult>, TResult>
026        implements ClientRequestCommand<TResult>, CreateHttpRequestCommand {
027
028    private final SphereRequest<?> request;
029    private final Class<TResult> resultClass;
030    private final String projectKey;
031
032    private CompatRequest(final ApiHttpClient apiHttpClient, final String projectKey, SphereRequest<?> request,
033            final Class<TResult> resultClass) {
034        super(apiHttpClient);
035        this.request = request;
036        this.projectKey = projectKey;
037        this.resultClass = resultClass;
038    }
039
040    private CompatRequest(CompatRequest<TResult> t) {
041        super(t);
042        this.request = t.request;
043        this.resultClass = t.resultClass;
044        this.projectKey = t.projectKey;
045    }
046
047    public static <TResult> CompatRequest<TResult> of(final ApiHttpClient client, final String projectKey,
048            final SphereRequest<?> request, final Class<TResult> resultClass) {
049        return new CompatRequest<>(client, projectKey, request, resultClass);
050    }
051
052    @Override
053    protected CompatRequest<TResult> copy() {
054        return new CompatRequest<>(this);
055    }
056
057    @Override
058    protected ApiHttpRequest buildHttpRequest() {
059
060        HttpRequest httpRequest = request.httpRequestIntent().toHttpRequest("/" + projectKey);
061        List<Map.Entry<String, String>> headers = httpRequest.getHeaders()
062                .getHeadersAsMap()
063                .entrySet()
064                .stream()
065                .flatMap(
066                    e -> e.getValue().stream().map(v -> new AbstractMap.SimpleEntry<String, String>(e.getKey(), v) {
067                    }))
068                .collect(Collectors.toList());
069
070        final URI resolve = URI.create(httpRequest.getUrl());
071        return new ApiHttpRequest(ApiHttpMethod.valueOf(httpRequest.getHttpMethod().name()), resolve,
072            new ApiHttpHeaders(headers), Optional.ofNullable(httpRequest.getBody()).map(body -> {
073                if (body instanceof StringHttpRequestBody) {
074                    return ((StringHttpRequestBody) body).getString().getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
075                }
076                if (body instanceof FormUrlEncodedHttpRequestBody) {
077                    return urlEncodedOf((FormUrlEncodedHttpRequestBody) body).getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
078                }
079                if (body instanceof FileHttpRequestBody) {
080                    return FileUtils
081                            .executing(() -> Files.readAllBytes(((FileHttpRequestBody) body).getFile().toPath()));
082                }
083                throw new HttpException("Cannot interpret request " + httpRequest);
084            }).orElse(null));
085    }
086
087    private static String urlEncodedOf(final FormUrlEncodedHttpRequestBody body) {
088        return body.getParameters().stream().map(entry -> {
089            try {
090                return entry.getName() + "=" + URLEncoder.encode(entry.getValue(), StandardCharsets.UTF_8.toString());
091            }
092            catch (UnsupportedEncodingException e) {
093                throw new HttpException("Cannot encode request body " + body, e);
094            }
095        }).collect(Collectors.joining("&"));
096    }
097
098    @Override
099    public ApiHttpResponse<TResult> executeBlocking(final ApiHttpClient client, Duration timeout) {
100        return client.executeBlocking(this, resultClass, timeout);
101    }
102
103    @Override
104    public CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<TResult>> execute(final ApiHttpClient client) {
105        return client.execute(this, resultClass);
106    }
107
108    @Override
109    public boolean equals(Object o) {
110        if (this == o)
111            return true;
112
113        if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass())
114            return false;
115
116        CompatRequest<?> request1 = (CompatRequest<?>) o;
117
118        return new EqualsBuilder().append(request, request1.request)
119                .append(resultClass, request1.resultClass)
120                .append(projectKey, request1.projectKey)
121                .isEquals();
122    }
123
124    @Override
125    public int hashCode() {
126        return new HashCodeBuilder(17, 37).append(request).append(resultClass).append(projectKey).toHashCode();
127    }
128}
